obligation: All personnel working on the PROJECT will undertake the required PPA induction via the Online Induction portal prior to commencing any work on site.

SCJV - during construction
Perdaman - during operations

obligation: The OWNER and MAC will establish a structured Aboriginal Heritage Liaison and Dispute Resolution Committee that provides a formal consultation on Aboriginal Cultural Heritage (ACH) matters for the Project.
compliance__comments: Find completion date in obligations register.

obligation: An environmental induction shall be developed by the CONTRACTOR for all personnel working on the site.
supporting__information: The CONTRACTOR Induction shall include, but not be limited to the following:-�	Key legal obligations including PROJECT approvals (EP Act, EPBC Act, PA Act, AH Act)-�	Land access restrictions-�	Aboriginal heritage sites and cultural awareness (Murujuga Rock Art Strategy & MAC involvement in PROJECT)-�	CEMP Summary-�	Protection of fauna, identification of protected fauna species and reporting requirements (sightings and injuries)-�	Hazardous materials storage and use-�	Spill management including use of spill kits-�	Waste management-�	Incident and hazard reporting

obligation: Personnel will undertake assessments throughout the induction to demonstrate their understanding and provide a record of inductions.
The HSSE Manager and Environmental Lead will identify the training needs for personnel onsite and establish a schedule of environmental training.
supporting__information: An outline of proposed training is provided in Table 3 of the Portside CEMP. Training may be tailored for specific environmental issues, certain work groups of activities associated with significant risk.

obligation: Personnel will be subject to continuous environmental training throughout the PROJECT life via regular toolbox talks
supporting__information: Toolbox talks will address particularly relevant tasks or issues. Pre-start meetings will be used to remind staff of environmental management issues.
compliance__comments: Verify compliance through monitoring of toolbox talks which are to be captured in audits.

obligation: The HSSE Manager and Environmental Lead will be responsible for maintaining and recording training on a Training Attendance Form. These records shall be transferred to the PROJECT Training Register (Site HSSE Inductions Work Instruction 0000-ZA-E-02901). This register will be made available to the OWNER environmental representative on request.
accountability:
SCJV - during construction
Perdaman - during operations
supporting__information: As a minimum the following will be recorded and maintained:-�	Records of training attendance e.g.: induction training, toolbox meetings.-�	Copies of training materials.-�	Competency assessments (where relevant).-�	Training matrix.
compliance__comments: Verify compliance through training records and audits.

obligation: CONTRACTOR will provide a field supervisor mentoring program to allow for ongoing support, training and mentoring, which will assist in the implementation of the CONTRACTOR Target Zero Management Plan.
accountability:
SCJV - during construction
Perdaman - during operations
supporting__information: This will incorporate the following:-�	Supervisory leadership-�	Effective communication and issue resolution-�	HSSE responsibilities and accountability-�	Legislative Requirements-�	Environmental and Heritage requirements-�	PROJECT HSSE expectations.

obligation: Trenching activities and excavations will be carried out in such a way to minimise impacts to fauna during construction.
compliance__comments: Verify compliance through inspections, audits and reporting.
notes_for__gap__analysis: No evidence of fauna injury/death from entrapment within trenches.

obligation: Open excavations shall be checked for trapped fauna no later than 3 hours after sunrise each day.
compliance__comments: Verify compliance through inspections, audits and reporting.
notes_for__gap__analysis: Doesn't explicitly say 3 hours, just says have they been checked?
